Html: Hello all. Very, very new to Dynamics. Our previous CRM admin retired and CRM was thrust upon me. We have CRM 2016 on-premise and I have admin priveleges to the system. Simple (if not stupid) question. How do you add, import, or save the XrmServiceToolkit for use within Dynamics CRM. I need to use for a function I found online that copies notes from leads to opportunities.
